result.reason: User requests additional dockable panels/tabs in the main application window using the existing DockPanel Suite framework.
result.approach: Create new custom Forms that inherit from DockContent to represent the desired new tabs. Instantiate and show these forms within the main FrmMain's DockPanel, specifying DockState.DockBottom for bottom placement. This will leverage the existing WeifenLuo.WinFormsUI.Docking library.
